reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made with a thick, sturdy material that's not too fuzzy, and they appreciate its versatility, being able to dress it up or down with leggings or pants.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy!
items.body: This is beautiful and fits perfectly! It's very soft and comfy. And good quality. I'm going to buy in other colors. Read more
items.author: Carol Jane Layman

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfy
items.body: I had no idea how amazingly soft this sweater would feel I love the beautiful rust red color for fall I love the heaviness of the fabric (it does not feel hot and scratchy though) It is just so beautiful, so very well made and oversized (I sized up another size bc I wanted it kind of longer but in hindsight probably didn‚Äôt need to do that) It was a great value too which I appreciated‚Ä¶ I cannot wait to get another color! Read more
items.author: EB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wrong Color?
items.body: I purchased this item before and other colors and wanted it in the regular ‚Äúpink‚Äù color. The sweater I received does not match the pink version depicted at all. What I received looks much more like the ‚Äúflush pink‚Äù color. I‚Äôm not sure if I received the wrong color sweater or if the colors are just poorly represented in the images. Either way, it‚Äôs frustrating to wait for an order and not receive what I was expecting. I‚Äôm not a fan of this light peachy pink color and really wanted a true light pink. The sweater itself is nice and good quality like the other colors I‚Äôve ordered. My photo compared to ‚Äúpink‚Äù and ‚Äúflush pink‚Äù screenshots are included for reference. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and comfy great fit
items.body: Obsessed. Fit is great and TTS/in between sized size down. SO soft. Great material. The blue is a gorgeous color. So good I got a second sweater in a diff color. Read more
items.author: Kail Rhine

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and cozy! Great with leggings
items.body: Super cute and cozy! Long length, perfect to wear with leggings. Material isn‚Äôt too thick or thin. I‚Äôm 5‚Äô7, 123 pounds, 36A, 27 in pants, and the small fits great. Read more
items.author: Emily Durr

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but not as good as the batwing turtleneck version
items.body: Was trying to find a sweater by this maker that was a crew neck version of there fabulous Oversized turtleneck batwing split sweater but without the turtleneck and in either a crew or even better a boatneck option. I thought this might be it, but the fabric is not the same, nor is the design and wash ability. The style is just a bit off of the other sweater which both fits well and holds up in the wash over time. The fabric on this one is more of a synthetic blend where the turtleneck version feels softer and has a more cotton texture blend. Lastly the turtleneck version is much more flattering in how it hangs on one‚Äôs body, making it easy for everyday or dressier occasions. Please consider making the exact same sweater as the turtleneck oversized batwing version just with no large neck, for those of us with mobility issues, a boatneck option would be just amazing, or even just a good sized crew neck that is not too tight at neck opening. Read more
items.author: E Bosio

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality üëå
items.body: This sweater is beautiful üòç the quality is amazing. I thought it was going to be cheap looking and a low quality thin material. But I was surprised, the material is so soft and buttery. This will keep you warm, it has some weight to it. I'm 5'4, about 182 pounds. I purchased this sweater in a large and it's the perfect fit, A bit oversized. Read more
items.author: Lulu

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but shorter then expected
items.body: Very cute sweater. Super soft. Washed once so far and everything‚Äôs fine. My only complaint is that it‚Äôs a bit short on me. I‚Äôm not a super tall person (5‚Äô6) so maybe I would just need to size up for the length to be better. I‚Äôm busty and usually wear a L/XL and got the L. Fits great other than the length. May get another color in the XL and I‚Äôll report back. Also yes the seams seem to be inside out which doesn‚Äôt really bother me because it looks intentional. You can turn it inside out and wear it that way (just have to cut the tags out) EDIT: the XL was way too big so I had to return it. Also there were no slits along the sides. I got a L in the black. It differs in size from the first color I got but will keep it. Sizing seems wonky Read more
items.author: Sarah Teune

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue White, Nutmeg, Fuchsia, Apricot, Black, Black White, Coffee, Pink Apricot, Deep Blue, Pink Green, Gray, Rust, Blue, Opal Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
